habilidades: [{'nome': 'Blaze', 'desc': 'Ups FIRE moves in a pinch.', 'efeito': "Blaze increases the power of Fire-type moves by 50% (1.5×) when the ability-bearer's HP falls below a third of its maximum (known in-game as in a pinch).", 'url': 'https://pokemondb.net/ability/blaze'}, {'nome': 'Solar Power', 'desc': 'Boosts Sp. Atk, but lowers HP in sunshine.', 'efeito': "During harsh sunlight, Solar Power raises the ability-bearer's Special Attack by 50%, but it also loses 1⁄8 of its maximum HP after each turn.", 'url': 'https://pokemondb.net/ability/solar-power'}]

[{'nome': 'Overgrow', 'desc': 'Ups GRASS moves in a pinch.', 'efeito': "Overgrow increases the power of Grass-type moves by 50% (1.5×) when the ability-bearer's HP falls below a third of its maximum (known in-game as in a pinch).", 'url': 'https://pokemondb.net/ability/overgrow'}, {'nome': 'Chlorophyll', 'desc': 'Raises SPEED in sunshine.', 'efeito': "Chlorophyll doubles the ability-bearer's Speed during bright sunshine.", 'url': 'https://pokemondb.net/ability/chlorophyll'}]

[{'nome': 'Vital Spirit', 'desc': 'Prevents sleep.', 'efeito': 'Vital Spirit prevents the ability-bearer from falling asleep. This means that it also prevents the use of the move Rest.', 'url': 'https://pokemondb.net/ability/vital-spirit'}]

[{'nome': 'Flower Gift', 'desc': 'Powers up party Pokémon when it is sunny.', 'efeito': 'Flower Gift raises the Attack and Special Defense of all party Pokémon by 50% during harsh sunlight.', 'url': 'https://pokemondb.net/ability/flower-gift'}]

[{'nome': 'Snow Cloak', 'desc': 'Raises evasion in a hailstorm.', 'efeito': "Snow Cloak raises ability-bearer's evasion by 20% in a hail storm. [{'nome': 'Chlorophyll', 'desc': 'Raises SPEED in sunshine.', 'efeito': "Chlorophyll doubles the ability-bearer's Speed during bright sunshine.", 'url': 'https://pokemondb.net/ability/chlorophyll'}, {'nome': 'Early Bird', 'desc': 'Awakens quickly from sleep.', 'efeito': 'The Pokémon awakens quickly from sleep.', 'url': 'https://pokemondb.net/ability/early-bird'}, {'nome': 'Pickpocket', 'desc': 'Steals an item when hit by another Pokémon.', 'efeito': 'Steals an item when hit by another Pokémon.', 'url': 'https://pokemondb.net/ability/pickpocket'}]

[{'nome': 'Pressure', 'desc': 'Raises foe’s PP usage.', 'efeito': 'Pressure makes any attack targeted at the ability-bearer - regardless of whether it hits - use 2 PP instead of 1.', 'url': 'https://pokemondb.net/ability/pressure'}, {'nome': 'Frisk', 'desc': 'The Pokémon can check the foe’s held item.', 'efeito': "The Pokémon can check a foe's held item.", 'url': 'https://pokemondb.net/ability/frisk'}]

[{'nome': 'Defeatist', 'desc': 'Lowers stats when HP becomes half or less.', 'efeito': 'When the HP of a Pokémon with Defeatist falls below 50%, its Attack and Special Attack stats are halved.', 'url': 'https://pokemondb.net/ability/defeatist'}]
[{'nome': 'Levitate', 'desc': 'Not hit by GROUND attacks.', 'efeito': 'Levitate causes the Pokémon to be raised (like Flying-type Pokémon).', 'url': 'https://pokemondb.net/ability/levitate'}]
